GetLinkedAccountInfo.description: List all my active linked external accounts; may be requested to return the access token

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: if specified then only return this external account type

parameters.name: return_access_token
parameters.description: if provided and true, then returns valid access token if available. It may refresh the token.

GetBroadcastUploadStats.description: Gets broadcast upload stats for user

parameters.name: row_limit
parameters.description: How many at maximum to return.

parameters.name: upload_id
parameters.description: Optional relay upload ID - not compatible with session_id

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: Optional the steamid whose stats you want, otherwise the user logged in - admin only

parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Optional broadcast session ID - not compatiable with upload_id

PostGameDataFrame.description: Add a game meta data frame to broadcast

parameters.name: rtmp_token

parameters.name: frame_data
parameters.description: game data frame expressing current state of game (string, zipped, whatever)

parameters.name: broadcast_buffer
parameters.description: Previous seconds we keep of the stream available

parameters.name: gamemode

parameters.name: mapgroup

AppAddUsersToGroup.description: App invite player(s) to a chat room that it controls, or just extend invite(s)

AppPostSystemMessageToGroup.description: App invite a player to a chat room that it controls, or just extend an invite

AppRemoveUsersFromGroup.description: App remove player(s) from a chat room that it controls

CreateAppChatRoomGroup.description: App creating a chat room and inviting players to it

SetAppChatRoomConfig.description: Update the display and rules properties for an app-created chat room

EndSecureMultiplayerSession.description: Tell the VAC servers that a secure multiplayer session has ended.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: The appid the user is playing.

GetCheatingReports.description: Get a list of cheating reports submitted for this app

parameters.name: timeend
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range .

parameters.name: timebegin
parameters.description: The end of the time range.

RemovePlayerGameBan.description: Remove a ban on a player

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: steamid of the user who is reported as cheating.

ReportCheatData.description: Reports cheat data. Only use on test account that is running the game but not in a multiplayer session.

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: steamid of the user running and reporting the cheat.

parameters.name: pathandfilename
parameters.description: path and file name of the cheat executable.

parameters.name: webcheaturl
parameters.description: web url where the cheat was found and downloaded.

parameters.name: time_started
parameters.description: local system time when cheat process started. ( 0 if not yet run )

parameters.name: time_stopped
parameters.description: local system time when cheat process stopped. ( 0 if still running )

parameters.name: game_process_id
parameters.description: process ID of the running game.

parameters.name: cheat_process_id
parameters.description: process ID of the cheat process that ran

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: steamid of the user who is reported as cheating.

parameters.name: steamidreporter
parameters.description: (Optional) steamid of the user or game server who is reporting the cheating.

parameters.name: appdata
parameters.description: (Optional) App specific data about the cheating.

parameters.name: heuristic
parameters.description: (Optional) extra information about the source of the cheating - was it a heuristic.

parameters.name: detection
parameters.description: (Optional) extra information about the source of the cheating - was it a detection.

parameters.name: playerreport
parameters.description: (Optional) extra information about the source of the cheating - was it a player report.

parameters.name: gamemode
parameters.description: (Optional) extra information about state of game - was it a specific type of game play (0 = generic)

parameters.name: suspicionstarttime
parameters.description: (Optional) extra information indicating how far back the game thinks is interesting for this user

parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: (Optional) level of severity of bad action being reported

parameters.name: matchid
parameters.description: (Optional) matchid to identify the game instance

parameters.name: cheating_type
parameters.description: (Optional) app specific data about the type of cheating

RequestPlayerGameBan.description: Requests a ban on a player

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: steamid of the user who is reported as cheating.

parameters.name: reportid
parameters.description: The reportid originally used to report cheating.

parameters.name: delayban
parameters.description: Delay the ban according to default ban delay rules.

parameters.name: flags
parameters.description: Additional information about the ban request.

parameters.name: invisible_ban
parameters.description: The ban will be recorded but not be visible or deny access to secure servers.

RequestVacStatusForUser.description: Checks a user's VAC session status. If verification fails, then do not let the user matchmake into a secure game.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: The appid the user is playing.

StartSecureMultiplayerSession.description: Tell the VAC servers that a secure multiplayer session has started

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: The appid the user is playing.

BeginHTTPUpload.description: Begins the process of uploading a file to Steam external storage services. File should be uploaded via HTTP PUT to the returned URL, after which the upload must be finalized by a call to CommitHTTPUpload.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App ID for which the file is being uploaded.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Name of the file to store in the cloud.

parameters.name: file_sha
parameters.description: Hex string (40 digits) representing the SHA1 digest of the file.

parameters.name: is_public
parameters.description: True if the file should be marked public on the UFS, false otherwise.

parameters.name: platforms_to_sync
parameters.description: Array of string specifying which platforms to sync; value values: all, Windows, MacOS, linux, Switch, iPhoneOS, Android.

parameters.name: request_headers_names
parameters.description: Names for headers you'll want to set on your upload request. May be left blank.

parameters.name: request_headers_values
parameters.description: Values for headers you'll want to set on your upload request. The number of names must equal the number of values.

CommitHTTPUpload.description: Commits a file upload initiated by BeginHTTPUpload and transferred via HTTP PUT.

parameters.name: transfer_succeeded
parameters.description: True if the HTTP PUT to the upload URL succeeded (URL provided in response to Cloud.BeginHTTPUpload), false if a failure occurred.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App ID for which the file is being uploaded. Must match the app ID provided to Cloud.BeginHTTPUpload.

parameters.name: file_sha
parameters.description: Hex string (40 digits) representing the SHA1 digest of the file. Must match the SHA1 digest provided to Cloud.BeginHTTPUpload.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: Filename as specified in the Cloud.BeginHTTPUpload request.

Delete.description: Deletes a file from the user's cloud.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App ID the file belongs to.

EnumerateUserFiles.description: Enumerates Cloud files for a user of a given app ID. Returns up to 500 files at a time.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App ID to enumerate the files of.

parameters.name: extended_details
parameters.description: (Optional) Get extended details back on the files found. Defaults to only returned the app Id and UGC Id of the files found.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: (Optional) Maximum number of results to return on this call. Defaults to a maximum of 500 files returned.

parameters.name: start_index
parameters.description: (Optional) Starting index to begin enumeration at. Defaults to the beginning of the list.

GetFileDetails.description: Returns details on a Cloud file.

parameters.name: ugcid
parameters.description: ID of the Cloud file to get details for.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App ID the file belongs to.

GetUploadServerInfo.description: Returns the URL of the proper cloud server for a user.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App ID to which a file will be uploaded to.

FilterStrings.description: Filter a list of strings in the requested language with rules that match the client.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: AppID that is asking to having filtering performed.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: In which language should filtering be performed. If empty, no profanity filtering will be performed.

parameters.name: legal_filtering_country
parameters.description: If set to an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code that requires legal filtering, that legal filtering will be performed.

parameters.name: raw_strings
parameters.description: The list of strings to be filtered.

parameters.name: is_name
parameters.description: True if the strings are names instead of chat text

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The SteamID of the person viewing the text

SetSteamCacheClientFilters.description: Update the client filters for a SteamCache node

parameters.name: allowed_ip_blocks
parameters.description: comma-separated list of allowed IP address blocks in CIDR format - blank to clear unfilter

SetSteamCachePerformanceStats.description: Update the performance/load stats for a SteamCache node

parameters.name: num_connected_ips
parameters.description: Number of unique connected IP addresses

parameters.name: upstream_egress_utilization
parameters.description: What is the percent utilization of the busiest datacenter egress link?

parameters.name: ipv6_public
parameters.description: client public ipv6 address if it knows it

CancelAppListingsForUser.description: Cancels all of a user's listings for a specific app ID.

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The SteamID of the user whose listings should be canceled

parameters.name: synchronous
parameters.description: Whether or not to wait until all listings have been canceled before returning the response

parameters.name: vac
parameters.description: This was in response to a VAC ban?

GetAssetID.description: Returns the asset ID of the item sold in a listing

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: The app that's asking. Must match the app of the listing and must belong to the publisher group that owns the API key making the request

parameters.name: listingid
parameters.description: The identifier of the listing to get information for

GetMarketEligibility.description: Checks whether or not an account is allowed to use the market

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The SteamID of the user to check

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language to use in item descriptions

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The result number to start at

parameters.name: filter_appid
parameters.description: If present, the app ID to limit results to

parameters.name: ecurrency
parameters.description: If present, prices returned will be represented in this currency

LearnItem.description: Teaches the market about a kind of item that may be listed on the market in the future.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: The app the item belongs to

CancelTradeOffer.description: Cancel a trade offer we sent

DeclineTradeOffer.description: Decline a trade offer someone sent to us

FlushAssetAppearanceCache.description: Flushes the display cache for assets.  This will result in calls to GetAssetClassInfo for each asset class the next time it is displayed.

FlushContextCache.description: Flushes the cache of inventory contents. This will result in calls to GetContexts and GetContextContents to get fresh data for each user next time Steam needs their inventory.

FlushInventoryCache.description: Flushes the cache for a user's inventory in a specific app context

parameters.name: max_trades
parameters.description: The number of trades to return information for

parameters.name: start_after_time
parameters.description: The time of the last trade shown on the previous page of results, or the time of the first trade if navigating back

parameters.name: start_after_tradeid
parameters.description: The tradeid shown on the previous page of results, or the ID of the first trade if navigating back

parameters.name: navigating_back
parameters.description: The user wants the previous page of results, so return the previous max_trades trades before the start time and ID

parameters.name: get_descriptions
parameters.description: If set, the item display data for the items included in the returned trades will also be returned

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language to use when loading item display data

parameters.name: include_total
parameters.description: If set, the total number of trades the account has participated in will be included in the response

GetTradeHoldDurations.description: Returns the estimated hold duration and end date that a trade with a user would have

parameters.name: trade_offer_access_token
parameters.description: A special token that allows for trade offers from non-friends.

parameters.name: get_descriptions
parameters.description: If set, the item display data for the items included in the returned trade offers will also be returned. If one or more descriptions can't be retrieved, then your request will fail.

GetTradeOffers.description: Get a list of sent or received trade offers

parameters.name: get_sent_offers
parameters.description: Request the list of sent offers.

parameters.name: get_received_offers
parameters.description: Request the list of received offers.

parameters.name: get_descriptions
parameters.description: If set, the item display data for the items included in the returned trade offers will also be returned. If one or more descriptions can't be retrieved, then your request will fail.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language to use when loading item display data.

parameters.name: active_only
parameters.description: Indicates we should only return offers which are still active, or offers that have changed in state since the time_historical_cutoff

parameters.name: historical_only
parameters.description: Indicates we should only return offers which are not active.

parameters.name: time_historical_cutoff
parameters.description: When active_only is set, offers updated since this time will also be returned

GetTradeOffersSummary.description: Get counts of pending and new trade offers

parameters.name: time_last_visit
parameters.description: The time the user last visited.  If not passed, will use the time the user last visited the trade offer page.

GetTradeStatus.description: Gets status for a specific trade

parameters.name: get_descriptions
parameters.description: If set, the item display data for the items included in the returned trades will also be returned

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language to use when loading item display data

GetActiveMessageSessions.description: Get information about recent offline messages and chats

parameters.name: lastmessage_since
parameters.description: return only session information where a chat message has been sent since this time (for polling)

parameters.name: only_sessions_with_messages
parameters.description: If non-zero, return only message sessions that have messages since our message cutoff. If zero, we return all active sessions.

GetRecentMessages.description: Get a log of recent chat messages between two users

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: If non-zero, cap the number of recent messages to return.

parameters.name: most_recent_conversation
parameters.description: Grab the block of chat from the most recent conversation (a ~5 minute period)

parameters.name: rtime32_start_time
parameters.description: If non-zero, return only messages with timestamps greater or equal to this. If zero, we only return messages from a recent time cutoff.

parameters.name: bbcode_format
parameters.description: Return the results with bbcode formatting.

parameters.name: start_ordinal
parameters.description: Combined with start time, only messages after this ordinal are returned (dedupes messages in same second)

parameters.name: time_last
parameters.description: if present/non-zero, return only messages before this.

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The steam ID of the account to operate on

parameters.description: The command to run on that asset

parameters.name: contextid

GetServerIPsBySteamID.description: Gets a list of server IP addresses given a list of SteamIDs

GetServerList.description: Gets a list of servers given a filter string

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of servers to return in the response

GetServerSteamIDsByIP.description: Gets a list of server SteamIDs given a list of IPs

QueryLoginToken.description: Queries the status of the specified token, which must be owned by you

ResetLoginToken.description: Generates a new login token for the specified game server

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The SteamID of the game server to reset the login token of

SetBanStatus.description: performs a GSLT ban/unban of GSLT associated with a GS. If banning, also bans associated users' GSLTs.

SetMemo.description: This method changes the memo associated with the game server account. Memos do not affect the account in any way. The memo shows up in the GetAccountList response and serves only as a reminder of what the account is used for.

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The SteamID of the game server to set the memo on

parameters.name: memo
parameters.description: The memo to set on the new account

AddItem.description: Adds an item to a user's inventory

parameters.name: notify
parameters.description: Should notify the user that the item was added to their Steam Inventory.

parameters.name: trade_restriction
parameters.description: If true, apply the default trade and market restriction times to this item.

parameters.name: is_purchase
parameters.description: If set, treat requestid as a txnid and create this item as a result of user microtransaction purchase.

AddPromoItem.description: Adds a promo item to a user's inventory

parameters.name: notify
parameters.description: Should notify the user that the item was added to their Steam Inventory.

parameters.name: trade_restriction
parameters.description: If true, apply the default trade and market restriction times to this item.

parameters.name: is_purchase
parameters.description: If set, treat requestid as a txnid and create this item as a result of user microtransaction purchase.

Consolidate.description: Consolidate items of the given type within an user's inventory

ConsolidateAll.description: Consolidate all items within an user's inventory

ExchangeItem.description: Craft an item in a user's inventory

GetAddItemHistory.description: Gets a list of items that have been added to accounts

GetInventory.description: Retrieves a users inventory as a big JSON blob

GetItemDefMeta.description: Get metadata about the current item definition for this game.

parameters.name: cache_max_age_seconds
parameters.description: Allow stale data to be returned for the specified number of seconds.

GetPriceSheet.description: Get the Inventory Service price sheet

GetQuantity.description: Get the total number of available items of the given type

ModifyItems.description: Modify an item in a user's inventory

SplitItemStack.description: Split an item stack into two stacks

CreateLobby.description: Creates a lobby and sets its related lobby data

GetLobbyData.description: Returns lobby data and member list

RemoveUserFromLobby.description: Removes a user from a lobby

GetCoPlayStatus.description: Get coplay status for two accounts

parameters.name: time_range_begin
parameters.description: unix time range begin to check

parameters.name: time_range_end
parameters.description: unix time range end to check

AddFriend.description: Invites another Steam user to be a friend

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: Steam ID of user to whom to send a friend invite.

ClientGetLastPlayedTimes.description: Gets the last-played times for the account

parameters.name: min_last_played
parameters.description: The most recent last-played time the client already knows about

GetAnimatedAvatar.description: Gets which animated avatar is active for a specific user

GetAvatarFrame.description: Gets which avatar frame is active for a specific user

GetBadges.description: Gets badges that are owned by a specific user

GetCommunityBadgeProgress.description: Gets all the quests needed to get the specified badge, and which are completed

GetFavoriteBadge.description: Gets the badge the user has set as their favorite

GetMiniProfileBackground.description: Gets which mini profile background is active for a specific user

GetNicknameList.description: Gets the list of nicknames this user has for other users

GetOwnedGames.description: Return a list of games owned by the player

parameters.name: include_appinfo
parameters.description: true if we want additional details (name, icon) about each game

parameters.name: include_played_free_games
parameters.description: Free games are excluded by default.  If this is set, free games the user has played will be returned.

parameters.name: appids_filter
parameters.description: if set, restricts result set to the passed in apps

parameters.name: include_free_sub
parameters.description: Some games are in the free sub, which are excluded by default.

parameters.name: skip_unvetted_apps
parameters.description: if set, skip unvetted store apps

GetProfileBackground.description: Gets which profile background is active for a specific user

GetProfileCustomization.description: Returns the customizations (if any) for a profile

GetProfileItemsEquipped.description: Returns the items the user has equipped on their profile

GetProfileItemsOwned.description: Returns the items the user can equip on their profile

GetProfileThemesAvailable.description: Gets themes available for the user.

GetPurchasedAndUpgradedProfileCustomizat.description: Returns the purchased and upgraded profile customizations

GetRecentlyPlayedGames.description: Gets information about a player's recently played games

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of games to return (0/unset: all)

GetSteamLevel.description: Returns the Steam Level of a user

GetSteamLevelDistribution.description: Returns how a given Steam Level compares the user base at large

IgnoreFriend.description: Blocks or unblocks communication with the user.  Despite name, can be a non-friend.

parameters.name: unignore
parameters.description: If set, remove from ignore/block list instead of adding

IsPlayingSharedGame.description: Returns valid lender SteamID if game currently played is borrowed

parameters.name: appid_playing
parameters.description: The game player is currently playing

RecordOfflinePlaytime.description: Tracks playtime for a user when they are offline

RemoveFriend.description: Removes a friend or ignores a friend suggestion

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: Steam ID of friend to remove.

SetAnimatedAvatar.description: Sets the user's animated avatar for their profile

SetAvatarFrame.description: Sets the user's avatar frame for their profile

SetEquippedProfileItemFlags.description: Sets special flags on the equipped item

SetFavoriteBadge.description: Sets the badge  as the users favorite

SetMiniProfileBackground.description: Sets the user's mini profile background

SetProfileTheme.description: Selects a theme for the profile

parameters.name: leaderboardName
parameters.description: The leaderboard name to fetch data for.

SetRichPresenceLocalization.description: Save and commit rich presence localization for the given app

CanSubscribe.description: Check if the user can subscribe to the published file

GetDetails.description: Retrieves information about a set of published files.

parameters.name: publishedfileids
parameters.description: Set of published file Ids to retrieve details for.

parameters.name: includetags
parameters.description: If true, return tag information in the returned details.

parameters.name: includeadditionalpreviews
parameters.description: If true, return preview information in the returned details.

parameters.name: includechildren
parameters.description: If true, return children in the returned details.

parameters.name: includekvtags
parameters.description: If true, return key value tags in the returned details.

parameters.name: includevotes
parameters.description: If true, return vote data in the returned details.

parameters.name: short_description
parameters.description: If true, return a short description instead of the full description.

parameters.name: includeforsaledata
parameters.description: If true, return pricing data, if applicable.

parameters.name: includemetadata
parameters.description: If true, populate the metadata field.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Specifies the localized text to return. Defaults to English.

parameters.name: return_playtime_stats
parameters.description: Return playtime stats for the specified number of days before today.

parameters.name: desired_revision
parameters.description: Return the data for the specified revision.

parameters.name: includereactions
parameters.description: If true, then reactions to items will be returned.

GetUserFiles.description: Retrieves files published by a user.

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: Steam ID of the user whose files are being requested.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App Id of the app that the files were published to.

parameters.name: numperpage
parameters.description: (Optional) The number of results, per page to return.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: (Optional) Type of files to be returned.

parameters.name: sortmethod
parameters.description: (Optional) Sorting method to use on returned values.

parameters.name: requiredtags
parameters.description: (Optional) Tags that must be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: excludedtags
parameters.description: (Optional) Tags that must NOT be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: required_kv_tags
parameters.description: Required key-value tags to match on.

parameters.name: filetype
parameters.description: (Optional) File type to match files to.

parameters.name: creator_appid
parameters.description: App Id of the app that published the files, only matched if specified.

parameters.name: match_cloud_filename
parameters.description: Match this cloud filename if specified.

parameters.name: cache_max_age_seconds
parameters.description: Allow stale data to be returned for the specified number of seconds.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Specifies the localized text to return. Defaults to English.

parameters.name: taggroups
parameters.description: (Optional) At least one of the tags must be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: totalonly
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, only return the total number of files that satisfy this query.

parameters.name: ids_only
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, only return the published file ids of files that satisfy this query.

parameters.name: return_tags
parameters.description: Return tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_kv_tags
parameters.description: Return key-value tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_previews
parameters.description: Return preview image and video details in the file details

parameters.name: return_children
parameters.description: Return child item ids in the file details

parameters.name: return_short_description
parameters.description: Populate the short_description field instead of file_description

parameters.name: return_playtime_stats
parameters.description: Return playtime stats for the specified number of days before today.

parameters.name: return_reactions
parameters.description: If true, then reactions to items will be returned.

parameters.name: desired_revision
parameters.description: Return the data for the specified revision.

Publish.description: Publishes a clouded user file to the Workshop.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: App Id this file is being published FROM.

parameters.name: consumer_appid
parameters.description: App Id this file is being published TO.

parameters.name: cloudfilename
parameters.description: Name of the file to publish in the user's cloud.

parameters.name: preview_cloudfilename
parameters.description: Name of the file to use as the published file's preview.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Text title for the published file.

parameters.name: file_description
parameters.description: Text description for the published file.

parameters.name: file_type
parameters.description: (EWorkshopFileType) Type of Workshop file to publish.

parameters.name: consumer_shortcut_name
parameters.description: Shortcut name for the published file.

parameters.name: youtube_videoid
parameters.description: (Optional) Video Id of a YouTube video for this published file.

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: (ERemoteStoragePublishedFileVisibility) Visibility of the published file (private, friends, public, etc.)

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: (Optional) If supplied, the resulting published file's Id is appended to the URI.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Array of text tags to apply to the published file.

parameters.name: collection_type
parameters.description: (Optional) Type of collection the published file represents.

parameters.name: game_type
parameters.description: (Optional) Type of game the published file represents.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: (Optional) If this represents a game, this is the URL to that game's page.

QueryFiles.description: Performs a search query for published files

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor to paginate through the results (set to '*' for the first request).  Prefer this over using the page parameter, as it will allow you to do deep pagination.  When used, the page parameter will be ignored.

parameters.name: numperpage
parameters.description: (Optional) The number of results, per page to return.

parameters.name: requiredtags
parameters.description: Tags to match on. See match_all_tags parameter below

parameters.name: excludedtags
parameters.description: (Optional) Tags that must NOT be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: match_all_tags
parameters.description: If true, then items must have all the tags specified, otherwise they must have at least one of the tags.

parameters.name: required_flags
parameters.description: Required flags that must be set on any returned items

parameters.name: omitted_flags
parameters.description: Flags that must not be set on any returned items

parameters.name: search_text
parameters.description: Text to match in the item's title or description

parameters.name: child_publishedfileid
parameters.description: Find all items that reference the given item.

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: If query_type is k_PublishedFileQueryType_RankedByTrend, then this is the number of days to get votes for [1,7].

parameters.name: include_recent_votes_only
parameters.description: If query_type is k_PublishedFileQueryType_RankedByTrend, then limit result set just to items that have votes within the day range given

parameters.name: cache_max_age_seconds
parameters.description: Allow stale data to be returned for the specified number of seconds.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language to search in and also what gets returned. Defaults to English.

parameters.name: required_kv_tags
parameters.description: Required key-value tags to match on.

parameters.name: taggroups
parameters.description: (Optional) At least one of the tags must be present on a published file to satisfy the query.

parameters.name: totalonly
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, only return the total number of files that satisfy this query.

parameters.name: ids_only
parameters.description: (Optional) If true, only return the published file ids of files that satisfy this query.

parameters.name: return_tags
parameters.description: Return tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_kv_tags
parameters.description: Return key-value tags in the file details

parameters.name: return_previews
parameters.description: Return preview image and video details in the file details

parameters.name: return_children
parameters.description: Return child item ids in the file details

parameters.name: return_short_description
parameters.description: Populate the short_description field instead of file_description

parameters.name: return_playtime_stats
parameters.description: Return playtime stats for the specified number of days before today.

parameters.name: return_details
parameters.description: By default, if none of the other 'return_*' fields are set, only some voting details are returned. Set this to true to return the default set of details.

parameters.name: desired_revision
parameters.description: Return the data for the specified revision.

parameters.name: return_reactions
parameters.description: If true, then reactions to items will be returned.

RefreshVotingQueue.description: Refresh the voting queue for the user

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Include files that have all the tags or any of the tags if match_all_tags is set to false.

parameters.name: match_all_tags
parameters.description: If true, then files must have all the tags specified.  If false, then must have at least one of the tags specified.

parameters.name: excluded_tags
parameters.description: Exclude any files that have any of these tags.

parameters.name: desired_queue_size
parameters.description: Desired number of items in the voting queue.  May be clamped by the server

parameters.name: desired_revision
parameters.description: Filter to items that have data for the specified revision.

SetDeveloperMetadata.description: Sets the metadata for a developer on the published file

Subscribe.description: Subscribes the user to the published file

Unsubscribe.description: Unsubscribes the user from the published file

parameters.name: publishedfileid
parameters.description: Published file id of the file we'd like update.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: (Optional) Set of tags for the published file.

parameters.name: preview_filename

parameters.name: image_width
parameters.description: (Optional) If this is an image file, you can specify the image width.

parameters.name: image_height
parameters.description: (Optional) If this is an image file, you can specify the image height.

UpdateAppUGCBan.description: Adds/updates/removes a UGC ban in the app

UpdateBanStatus.description: Updates the ban status on the item

UpdateIncompatibleStatus.description: Update the incompatible status on the item

UpdateKeyValueTags.description: Updates key/value tags for a published file

UpdateTags.description: Updates tags on the published file

parameters.description: Steamworks Web API publisher authentication key.

parameters.name: rowversion
parameters.description:
An unsigned 64-bit value used to page through deleted accounts. Pass 0 when calling this
            API for the first time, then pass the value returned from the previous call for each
            additional request. This value will need to be stored on your server for future calls.

parameters.name: packagerowversion
parameters.description: The unsigned 64-bit row version to read package changes from. The row version of data read up to will be returned for use in future calls.

parameters.name: cdkeyrowversion
parameters.description: The unsigned 64-bit row version to read CD Key changes from. The row version of data read up to will be returned for use in future calls.

parameters.name: ipaddress
parameters.description: ip address of user in string format (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx).

parameters.name: thirdpartykey
parameters.description: Optionally associate third party key during grant. 'thirdpartyappid' will have to be set.

parameters.name: thirdpartyappid
parameters.description: Has to be set if 'thirdpartykey' is set. The appid associated with the 'thirdpartykey'.

parameters.name: vanityurl
parameters.description: The vanity URL to get a SteamID for

parameters.name: url_type
parameters.description: The type of vanity URL. 1 (default): Individual profile, 2: Group, 3: Official game group

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: Should be the users steamid, unencrypted.

parameters.name: sessionkey
parameters.description: Should be a 32 byte random blob of data, which is then encrypted with RSA using the Steam system's public key.  Randomness is important here for security.

parameters.name: encrypted_loginkey
parameters.description: Should be the users hashed loginkey, AES encrypted with the sessionkey.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: OAuth2 token for which to return details

parameters.name: gameid
parameters.description: GameID to retrieve the achievement percentages for

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: AppID that we're getting global stats for

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of stats get data for

parameters.name: name[0]
parameters.description: Names of stat to get data for

parameters.name: startdate
parameters.description: Start date for daily totals (unix epoch timestamp)

parameters.name: enddate
parameters.description: End date for daily totals (unix epoch timestamp)

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: AppID that we're getting user count for

parameters.name: l
parameters.description: localized language to return (english, french, etc.)

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of stats and achievements to set a value for (name/value param pairs)

parameters.name: name[0]
parameters.description: Name of stat or achievement to set

parameters.name: videoid
parameters.description: ID of the video on the provider's site

parameters.name: accountname
parameters.description: Account name of the video's owner on the provider's site

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message that was last known to the user

parameters.name: secidletime
parameters.description: How many seconds is client considering itself idle, e.g. screen is off

parameters.name: use_accountids
parameters.description: Boolean, 0 (default): return steamid_from in output, 1: return accountid_from

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: AppID of game this transaction is for

parameters.name: revenuepercentage[0]
parameters.description: Percentage of revenue the owners of the workshop item will get from the sale of the item [0.0, 100.0].  For bundle-like items, send over an entry for each item in the bundle (gameitemid = bundle id) with different publishedfileids and with the revenue percentage pre-split amongst the items in the bundle (i.e. 30% / 10 items in the bundle)

parameters.name: gameitemdescription[0]
parameters.description: Game's description of the game item

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: AppID of game this transaction is for

GetAppList.description: Gets a list of apps available on the Steam Store.

parameters.name: if_modified_since
parameters.description: Return only items that have been modified since this date.

parameters.name: have_description_language
parameters.description: Return only items that have a description in this language.

parameters.name: last_appid
parameters.description: For continuations, this is the last appid returned from the previous call.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Number of results to return at a time.  Default 10k, max 50k.

GetMostPopularTags.description: Get all whitelisted tags, with localized names.

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The Steam ID to fetch items for

parameters.name: promoid
parameters.description: The promo ID to grant an item for

GetTrustScore.description: Returns the Trust Score for the provided account in the specified appid.

AddAuthenticator.description: Add two-factor authenticator to the logged-in account

parameters.name: sms_phone_id
parameters.description: ID of phone to use for SMS verification

DestroyEmergencyCodes.description: Destroy emergency authenticator codes for the account

FinalizeAddAuthenticator.description: Finalize two-factor authentication addition to the logged-in account

QuerySecrets.description: Get two-factor secrets for the logged-in account

QueryStatus.description: Get two-factor authentication settings for the logged-in account

QueryTime.description: Get server's idea of the current time

parameters.name: sender_time
parameters.description: Current time on the sender (for stats, don't trust this)

RemoveAuthenticator.description: Remove two-factor authentication addition from the logged-in account

parameters.name: revocation_reason
parameters.description: Reason the authenticator is being removed

parameters.name: steamguard_scheme
parameters.description: Type of Steam Guard to use once token is removed

parameters.name: include_activation_code
parameters.description: Include activation code in email parameters

GetAvailableValveDiscountPromotions.description: Gets the available promotional discounts available to the user

GetVideoBookmarks.description: Returns the video bookmarks locations for the specific videos. Includes playback settings per video

parameters.name: appids
parameters.description: List of App IDs to grab bookmarks for. Can be empty if using updated_since.

parameters.name: updated_since
parameters.description: Only return results after time. Min value is 1. (seconds since epoch January 1st, 1970 Unix Time)

SetVideoBookmark.description: Bookmarks the locations in the video the user has reached. As as record playback settings per video. Fire and forget.

parameters.name: bookmarks
parameters.description: list of bookmarks we want to store.

AddSpecialPayment.description: Add a special payment for an appid/gameitemid.

parameters.name: payment_us_usd
parameters.description: US Payment portion in USD Cents

parameters.name: payment_row_usd
parameters.description: ROW Payment portion in USD Cents

GetFinalizedContributors.description: Get a list of contributors for a specific gameitemid/app combination.

GetItemDailyRevenue.description: Get item revenue for a specific app/item definition for a date range.

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: Only validates the rules and does not persist them.
